item.title: Review: Enhanced Sniper
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for Enhanced Sniper | Posted by Peter on 2002-10-24 | Score: 9.1 ]
Not ex
Don't confuse Enhanced Sniper with External Sniper. They are two different mutators, although they both enhance sniping in one way or another. I like Enhanced Sniper a lot more than External Sniper nice Enhanced Sniper helps snipers.

Perfect Zoom
Whenever you zoom with the Enhanced...

item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for Psi Weapon Dreams v1.01 | Posted by Dade on 2003-04-20 | Score: 8.8 ]
(This mutator was tested on a 1.8 P4, 256RDram, and 64mb GForce3 machine)

Sure its just a weapons mutator. But I have to say that I have never seen a basic UT weapons mutator with more eye candy than Psi-Shock’s Psi Weapon Dreams. Loads of hard work has gone into each weapon. The new models are pretty good and...

item.title: Review: FragHouse Invasion 3.1
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transscript of review for FragHouse Invasion 3.1 | Posted by Bean on 2004-07-04 | Score: 8.5 ]
Fraghouse Invasion is a twist on the regular old Invasion from Epic. The monsters spawn in a preset place and you have many different weapons to defend yourself with. Not just the substandard Epic standard fare. They work well, just not against monsters in Invasion. Weapons are sort of basic so I’ll just breeze...

item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for StuffSwapper 3.1 | Posted by Shuri on 2003-06-27 | Score: 9.5 ]
<b>Some Info</b>
For those of you who are new to StuffSwapper, please check out the last review since it explains the entire concept of the mutator and how to use it correctly. If you want a one-line summary, it basically allows you to import weapons from different mods/mutators and play them all together at once....

item.title: Review: Little Tweaker
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for Little Tweaker | Posted by Peter on 2002-10-04 | Score: 8.4 ]
Tweak me up
Many utilities that come out for UT claiming to improve your FPS rating will usually work for some people and not for others. Take Tweak3D for instance. It helped me gain about 3-5 FPS, but for others, it didn't do anything at all. However, with Little Tweaker, I think that the majority of the people...

item.title: Review: Mutator Toolbox
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for Mutator Toolbox | Posted by Shuri on 2003-06-09 | Score: 9 ]
<b>Tweak it</b>
Lots of people like tweaking things to suit their style. These tweaks are probably tweaks to Windows, but why not tweak Unreal Tournament to suit your needs? Mutator Toolbox is a mutator that allows you to tweak many settings. Anything from the amount of ammo per ammo pack to the rate weapons and items...

item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for UMX Decoder | Posted by Peter on 2002-10-06 | Score: 9.5 ]
Geek Factor?
My very first thought when Peter asked me to look at this plugin for WinAmp was pretty simple: How big a geek do you have to be to want to listen to game music when you're not playing the game? After listening to a few tracks sans explosions, taunts, and bullets whistling past my ear, I'd have to say not...

item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transscript of review for Clone Bandits v1.0 | Posted by Bean on 2004-07-01 | Score: 7 ]
First, don\'t let that 7.0 deceive you. This is one FUN mod. That is the most important part isn\'t it? I mean...it is FUN. It\'s fun like Zelda is fun. You know you JUST know the new Zelda game is gonna be fun. You buy it, pop it in, and just watching the intro makes your heart warm. You know what I mean. That...

item.title: Review: Redeemer 2k3
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for Redeemer 2k3 | Posted by Shuri on 2003-07-01 | Score: 8.5 ]
One of the main selling points of UT2003 was it's visuals - when it was released it was the best looking game around, and it is still has great graphics. The effects are amazing at times, and many of the weapons received a complete makeover from their UT1 variants - especially the redeemer. While the redeemer had a fairly...

item.title: Review: Unreal Fortress Gold
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for Unreal Fortress Gold | Posted by Bean on 2003-05-12 | Score: 10 ]
Wow. That's all there is to say. Wow. Unreal Fortress does a total kick-ass job at bringing TFC to UT. Having played TFC for about 2 years, I have no complaints about UNF at all. For all of you veteran TFC players, UNF does not disappoint in any way. For those of you who don't play TFC, UNF will knock your socks off,...

item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for UMX Player | Posted by Peter on 2002-10-06 | Score: 7.8 ]
UT Music
Many of the tunes in Unreal Tournament are pretty catchy and nice to listen to. Too bad there's a large portion of the songs that people didn't hear. That's why there's the UMX Player. Complex

In order to play *.umx files, download this player and make sure you have Winamp. Then place the UMX Player into...

[ Transscript of review for U4E for UT2K4 (MSU Version) | Posted by Bean on 2004-07-03 | Score: 8.5 ]
Man has U4E ever come a long way from Version 1 for UT2K4. The team hasn’t just polished the mod. Imagine polishing stone to the point it shines, and never stopping until it’s done. Then imagine a hundred walls being done in this way and you get the idea of the tremendous effort everyone’s put into U4E....

item.title: Review: Shattered Oasis 2.20
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jesco)
item.dc:creator: Jesco
item.content:encoded:
[ Transcript of review for Shattered Oasis 2.20 | Posted by Bean on 2004-07-02 | Score: 6.5 ]
I don't get it. I just don't get it. This mod has most of the pieces needed for greatness. But...it...just...doesn't get me. It's so close, I can taste it. It's there, and I'm sure it will come out. But until then, I shall wish...and wait.
